mapper.select: SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, DMON, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM, TAC FROM ( SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, DMON, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM, TAC,rownum r FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_NOBUS t1 WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rownum <= #{endNum} and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR_NOBUS WHERE PID=t1.PID AND PSN=t1.PSN and TAC=t1.TAC ) ) WHERE r > #{startNum}
SELECT count(1) FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR_NOBUS WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
